name: SmartBen
0:
”Alexa start SmartBen.”
”How much paid time off do I have?”
”Tell me about my telemedicine program.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smartben
Developer Terms of Use
des:
SmartBen for Alexa helps you get the most out of your benefits by allowing you to ask for information regarding your benefits and more.

You can ask about your PTO balance, Telemedicine program, 401k, Prescription Copayment amounts, Wellness program, Health Annual Deductible Plan, Out of pocket deductible plan, Healthcare Savings Account, or Flex spending account.

 This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
